2054.subject: SPAN
2054.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Spanish. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in SPAN 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in SPAN 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in SPAN 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in SPAN 201 or 202.
